title: lag spikes 10-20 times/game
body:
I have been experiencing lag spikes will playing League. Now, when I say lag spikes, my ping jumps from the usual ~24 to ~70, but the fps halves and everything freezes. This has been going on for over a month.

My wife is also playing on her computer, on the same wireless connection, with no issues and entirely worse hardware.

My computer is pretty high-end, I have no issues with other games I play.
6700k@4ghz, 1070(16g), 16g RAM, win10
I have 100mbps down and 30mbps up, and can get near those numbers running a speedtest during play
Memory usage has never gone over 64% usage
CPU usage is never over 38%
LoL is on an SSD, with 60% free space
Generally playing ARAM on this account, but happens in all game modes

Things I have tried:
Reinstall LoL(deleting all folders)
Reinstall Directx
Reinstall AIR
Checking system monitor during play
Downloading a third party system monitor to check during play
Shutting down every other program running
ping -t google.com, no dropped packets (i can't ping pvp.net, ddos protections)
tracert to pvp.net(no issues)
Used a stress testing program and found no issues
Computer has never overheated, it is always monitored
set leagueoflegends.exe to highest priority in resource monitor
disabled antivirus for an hour
set league as exception in antivirus software
uninstalled antivirus software
disabled windows firewall
probably more I'm not thinking about

replies.body:
Wow you've definitely done your part of the troubleshooting I'd say O_O. Since you've tested all of those steps and still don't see any kind of change, it really makes me think those random ping/fps spikes are being caused by some packet loss. 

Let's take a quick minute to look at your latest game logs to see exactly what may have been going on there. Grab those logs, and toss 'em into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743), then use something like Gyazo or Imgur to link me a screenshot of what the results are,
